ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe B Relativistic Electron Proton Telescope (REPT,)Ion Fluxes Summary Plots
ResourceHeader.Description: Van Allen Probe B, Summary Plots of Ion fluxes measured by the Relativistic Electron Proton Telescope (REPT), which is one of three instruments on the Energetic Particle, Composition and Thermal Plasma Suite (ECT)

InformationURL.Name: ECT Science and Data Portal
InformationURL.Description: the RBSP-ECT data processing has been migrated from LANL to the New Mexico Consortium (NMC) which is a university-owned research institute affiliated with LANL

AccessURL.Name: The Van Allen Probes Science Gateway
